name: FireTry
description:
Are you ready to advance into enemy lines? Only the bravest and most skilled tank commanders will survive on the perilous battlefield. Welcome to FireTry!

FireTry offers an epic experience of 2D overhead tank battles. Each level turns into an arena where strategy and speed dance, filled with challenging obstacles and traps. Take on epic tank battles for up to 4 players in sharedscreen co-op mode, alone or with your best friends.

There is an even more special feature in the game that offers an unexpected and unique experience for you: steer your tank with your own codes! Control your tank's moves using simple script codes. Plan your strategy to dominate enemy lines, then test your codes in your division and take down your opponents for victory.

Explore the partition designer using your own creativity. Bring your own tank battles to life, customize existing chapters and challenge players with challenging and exciting missions. Upgrade your tank with boosters after breakable boxes: surprise your enemies with shields, special weapons and speed boosters and gain the upper hand.

Fight with FireTry, plan your strategy and team up with your friends in co-op mode. Get a unique experience by manipulating your tank with your codes and unleash your creativity with the section designer. You and your tank become heroic shining stars in the midst of battle! Are you ready? Dive into the world of FireTry from the moment the war begins and fight to become the legendary tank commander!

Features in the game;
* More than 50+ levels
* 15 different tanks
* Level Editor
* Script engine command interpreter
* Shared Screen Multiplayer support
* You can vote for your favorite levels
* You can be superior to your competitors by taking the feature out of the boxes. (Shield, weapon, accelerator...)
* Supported controllers: Keyboard and mouse, standart gamepad, xbox 360 gamepad
* Supports steam achievements
* Supports steam cloud
